extendedInfo.description: *** TRIAL VERSION OF DOUBLETWIST ALARM CLOCK - TRIAL EXPIRES AFTER 7 DAYS ***doubleTwist Alarm Clock is hands-down the most beautiful alarm app in the Google Play Store, following doubleTwist's history of simple, intuitive, highly functional, gorgeous apps, as seen with the doubleTwist Player media app.Gently awaken to your favorite medley. Or violently rouse yourself from deep slumber with death metal. The choice is yours!Alarm Clock Features:â¢ Two clock modes: flip clock and analog clock, includes nightstand dim mode.â¢ Set alarm through one of four modes: Time, Sleep Cycle, Quick Nap, or Sunrise. Sleep Cycle helps pick optimal wake-up times to correspond with sleep cycles.â¢ Set multiple alarms.â¢ Set recurring alarms (weekdays, weekends, etc).â¢ Set a custom label for your alarms.â¢ Choose from built-in alarm sounds and ringtones or wake up to your favorite song or playlist (requires free doubleTwist Player app).â¢ Set adjustable fade in time for alarm volume.â¢ View time pending until next scheduled alarm.â¢ Set snooze duration and alarm volume.â¢ Swiss Clock live wallpaper.doubleTwist Alarm Clock is handmade with â¤ in San Francisco.If you have comments or feedback on our app, or need additional support, please visit http://doubletwist.com/contact/. Thanks! Use of this app is subject to the doubleTwist Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: http://doubletwist.com/legal/*** TRIAL VERSION OF DOUBLETWIST ALARM CLOCK - TRIAL EXPIRES AFTER 7 DAYS ***

reviews.title: It\'s okay.
reviews.comment: Lack of Daydream support is a huge bummer. Wish the digital clock had a dim mode.  Wish that when you unlocked your phone the clock would close. Won\'t be purchasing yet....
reviews.author: WiLL S

reviews.title: Basic
reviews.comment: Falls way short of the options and functions of alarm clock extreme. But does the job nonetheless. ..nice clean simple interface.
reviews.author: CJ Martinez

reviews.title: Love this, but...
reviews.comment: the digital clock needs to have a dim option. The regular clock has it, so why not the digital. Won\'t be investing money until that option is available. Samsung GN2.
reviews.author: Jason Curtis

reviews.title: Disappointed.
reviews.comment: I like the sleep cycle function. It keeps resetting the ringer to the default even if I have it set to my alarms playing. I purchased in-app when my trial ended, but doesn\'t say I bought the full version in the store so I can\'t reinstall. Not enough snooze options. No email to contact developer. Take your money elsewhere.
reviews.author: Ryan Covey

reviews.title: A simple yet elegant alarm clock...
reviews.comment: I will purchase the full app after 7 day trial. It is worth it for the simplicity!  Galaxy note i717 rooted with stock ics.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs more
reviews.comment: I love this, I only wish the sunrise alarm could be set for 10 minutes before (for example) so people could actually be out to see it.
reviews.author: Mykel O\'Hara

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work with S4 S view case...
reviews.comment: Weird one...with my S view case on the alarm snoozes straight away, making alarm entirely useless. Leave case open and it\'s fine! Please fix. Makes this app a waste of money...
reviews.author: Matthew Watts

reviews.title: Good but needs more functions
reviews.comment: The app looks lovely, the only feature that it needs to make me use it as my default alarm app is solvable problems such as math problems or which day of the week it is e.t.c
reviews.author: Shyam Chapaneri

reviews.title: Works & looks great, but...
reviews.comment: I can\'t find icons that match the clock\'s aqua colour. (may have found one, but it costs too). Also only theme icons show, not the theme itself. I\'d like to make it more unique and mine. The clock and black background are sleek, but I like to change up my screen often. I\'m on the week trial and this will make or break my buying it.
reviews.author: Holly Graham

reviews.title: Way better than stock app.
reviews.comment: Works great. Tons of cool features like optimal sleep schedules as well as sunrise and sunset times. The music integrates well with the alarm. In addition the analog clock is elegant and there is an option to keep the screen on all night. I also like that the clock can be dimmed. I would highly recommend all doubletwist products.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless on my Galaxy S3 Mini
reviews.comment: The alarm sound I set was completely ignored; instead the app used my phonecall ringtone which frightened the life out of me - phone calls very early in the morning are usually not good news. Also the \'snooze\' and \'dismiss\' buttons are so tiny I had to scramble for my glasses to see how to shut the noise off. Very disappointing. Nice looking clockface though. Uninstalled after one use.
reviews.author: Peter Evans

reviews.title: Great Alarm
reviews.comment: Great multiple alarm. Good touch on having the clock come up when the alarm goes of. Have to upgrade after a week.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: beautiful ui
reviews.comment: I need to set a recurring alarm to wake up 30 min before sunrise for prayer. Could you please add an option for this. Then I would buy it certainly.
reviews.author: Faruk Kutlu

reviews.title: Simple, could use some extras...
reviews.comment: This app would be better with a widget displaying time until next alarm, optional customizable snooze times, ability to manually organize alarms, optional bedtime alarm set based on sleep pattern alarm, and longer than one hour on countdown alarm. Also would like the notification bar to display the name of the alarm instead of double Twist alarm. If free apps offer these things, most wouldn\'t want to pay for fewer options.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: A good looking app with all necessary features. The only obvious feature that is missing is a shortcut to add a nap alarm. Now it takes a few unnecessary steps to do that common task..
reviews.author: Amer Demirovic

reviews.title: Assumes good eyesight.
reviews.comment: I cannot read the snooze and dismiss buttons when I wake up. Need to be bigger, or different shapes, or different colors. Otherwise great app.
reviews.author: Philip Wright

reviews.title: Less is more
reviews.comment: Really clean, simple app that does the basics well. I have no need to have a q&a session to wake up, just an alarm clock! That\'s what this is, an alarm clock app....
reviews.author: Luke Dutton

reviews.title: Beautiful.. But
reviews.comment: Beautiful app but alarms don\'t ingrate with the stock Android alarm icon..app forces you to use their icon and has an annoying notification banner ..please have the app use Androids stock alarm icon ..Nexus 4 with Android 4.2.1
reviews.author: Michael J

reviews.title: Works great and you pick your music uou want to wake up to.
reviews.comment: AWESOME!!!
reviews.author: Holly Jo

reviews.title: Great look but could have feature improvements
reviews.comment: e.g. night clock doesn\'t come on immediately when the screen is powered on, the nap timer setting could be saved between each use, perhaps some downloadable sounds would be nice, the sleep cycle function could be more sophisticated somehow.
reviews.author: John Pegler
